com.simas.vc

Class ArgumentBuilder

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.simas.vc.ArgumentBuilder

  • public class ArgumentBuilder
extends java.lang.Object
    Custom argument builder. Strings passed to add will be split by string and parsed as separate arguments. Quoted strings passed to add will be parsed as a single argument. E.g. File names can have spaces in them therefore they should be added as a single parameter with addSpaced.

    • Method Detail

      • addSpaced

        public ArgumentBuilder addSpaced(java.lang.String arg)
        Adds the given string as a full argument. It won't be split by spaces.
        Parameters:
        arg - spaced argument

      • addSpaced

        public ArgumentBuilder addSpaced(java.lang.String format,
                        java.lang.Object... args)

      • addSpaced

        public ArgumentBuilder addSpaced(java.lang.String[] args)
        Adds multiple arguments to the builder without splitting any of them. Equivalent to multiple calls to addSpaced(String).
        Parameters:
        args - spaced argument list to be added
